channel.title: Which way do the npc's face?!?!?!?!?!?!?
channel.description:
hey i have a liitle problem...... when i add objects and npc's they always face down(south).
how can i change this?????
please reply as soon as you can because my server is going down soon :D :D :D

item.title: Which way do the npc's face?!?!?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @xxrazorscapexx xxrazorscapexx
item.description:
@xxrazorscapexx wrote:

dude 0= south coz wen i do 0 they always face south…

item.title: Which way do the npc's face?!?!?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

i’m not to sure about the npc’s but objects are easy.

makeGlobalObject(2465, 4775, 2783, -2, 10);// Anvil

see the -2 change that to one of the following: -3 = south | -2 = east | -1 = north | 0 = west

Read full topic
